translations.en: I will fully cooperate with you
translations.zh: 我將全力配合您

translations.en: It's been a while
translations.zh: 有一陣子了

translations.en: Shouldn't you go to bed?
translations.zh: 你不應該去睡覺嗎？

translations.en: How've you been?
translations.zh: 最近怎麼樣？

translations.en: I'm not used to speaking English
translations.zh: 我不習慣講英文

translations.en: I will watch movies and comics to study
translations.zh: 我會看電影與漫畫學習

translations.en: But I think I still need someone to talk to me
translations.zh: 但我認為我還是需要人跟我講話

translations.en: Because we have more than 10 kinds of projects
translations.zh: 因為我們有10種以上的專案

translations.en: It will take a lot of time
translations.zh: 這會花很多時間

translations.en: Sorry, I forgot, I can't answer you
translations.zh: 對不起，我忘記了，我不能回答你

translations.en: Thanks for talking to me
translations.zh: 謝謝你與我交談

translations.en: I do not know what to say
translations.zh: 我不知該說什麼

translations.en: I have no AWS experience
translations.zh: 我沒有AWS的經驗

translations.en: But I said it badly
translations.zh: 但我說的很差

translations.en: I don't know how to say this, but...
translations.zh: 我不知道該怎麼說，但...

translations.en: It is hard to say
translations.zh: 這個不好說

translations.en: You are a special girl to me
translations.zh: 對我來說你是個很特別女孩

translations.en: If there really is no way, I suggest...
translations.zh: 如果真的沒有辦法,我建議...

translations.en: You are a special girl to me.
translations.zh: 對我來說你是個很特別的女孩。

translations.en: I will take a look.
translations.zh: 我會看一下

translations.en: What does this mean?
translations.zh: 這是什麼意思？

translations.en: Show favorites list only
translations.zh: 僅顯示收藏夾列表

translations.en: I want to ask who got this job QQ?
translations.zh: 我想問一下誰得到了這個工作 QQ？

translations.en: Excuse me, are you referring to me?
translations.zh: 打擾一下，您指的是我嗎？？

translations.en: I practice English very hard.
translations.zh: 我非常努力地練習英語。

translations.en: This is what I created from scratch
translations.zh: 這是我從頭開始創建的

translations.en: I like white, it gives me a sense of innocence, optimism and a very sacred feeling
translations.zh: 我喜歡白色，它給我一種純真、樂觀和一種很神聖的感覺

translations.en: I have several questions about this issue.
translations.zh: 對於這個問題我有幾個疑問。

translations.en: Don't worry about this problem.
translations.zh: 不用擔心這個問題。

translations.en: I don't want to teach others bad habits.
translations.zh: 我不想教別人壞習慣。

translations.en: I haven't opened VRChat in at least a year.
translations.zh: 我至少有一年沒有打開 VRChat 了。

translations.en: The most important thing during the interview is to be in a good mood.
translations.zh: 面試的時候最重要的是心情好。

translations.en: With this tool, my English skills are bound to improve.
translations.zh: 有了這個工具，我的英語程度一定會提升。

translations.en: I'm waiting for you to introduce girls to me.
translations.zh: 我等著你跟我介紹女孩子。

translations.en: Did the company you interviewed with last time not accept you?
translations.zh: 上次面試的公司沒有錄取你嗎？

translations.en: Don't hesitate, just take off with no regrets?
translations.zh: 來一次遠走高飛 再猶豫就別後悔？

translations.en: Always placing other's priorities first, leaving myself for last
translations.zh: 任何事都為別人 自己擺在最後面

translations.en: Can you give me some tips for improving my programming skills?
translations.zh: 你能給我一些提高編程技能的建議嗎？

translations.en: How can I prepare for a technical interview?
translations.zh: 我該如何為技術面試做準備？

translations.en: If I only have the frontend without backend server support, what methods can I use to store data on the client side?
translations.zh: 如果我只有前端，沒有後端服務器支援，那麼我可以使用什麼方法在客戶端存儲資料?

translations.en: Of course, as long as you're brave enough to try.
translations.zh: 當然可以，只要你敢嘗試。

translations.en: Sure, why not? Anything's possible if you're brave enough.
translations.zh: 當然可以，為什麼不呢？只要你足夠勇敢，一切皆有可能。

translations.en: Well, that depends. Are you ready for a little adventure?
translations.zh: 這取決於情況。你準備好迎接一點冒險了嗎？

translations.en: In my heart, Casper, my senior, is the most awesome.
translations.zh: 在我心裡，我的學長 Casper 是最香的。

translations.en: Now, when I'm confessing my feelings to you.
translations.zh: 現在，當我向你坦白我的感情時。

translations.en: I also think so.
translations.zh: 我也是這樣想。

translations.en: Please introduce me to a girl who can save me years of struggle.
translations.zh: 請介紹一個能讓我少奮鬥幾年的女孩。

translations.en: Every day, I'm doing my best.
translations.zh: 每一天，我都在盡我最大的努力。

translations.en: I specially created a web application to learn English.
translations.zh: 我為了學英文特地做了一個網頁應用程式。

translations.en: The triggers for my PTSD are usually not subjects, but people and teachers.
translations.zh: 觸發我的創傷後壓力症候群的通常不是主題，而是人和老師。

translations.en: Good evening, Big Rabbit.
translations.zh: 晚上好，大兔子。

translations.en: Modify the copy function prompt message.
translations.zh: 修改複製功能的提示訊息。

translations.en: Incorporate several new sentences into the JSON file.
translations.zh: 將幾個新句子納入 JSON 檔案中。

translations.en: You are gorgeous.
translations.zh: 你真漂亮。

translations.en: I switched my phone and computer to English mode to practice English.
translations.zh: 我將手機和電腦切換到英文模式來練習英文。

translations.en: No special reason, just studying for work.
translations.zh: 沒有特別的原因，只是為工作學習。

translations.en: Modify CSS styles and layout.
translations.zh: 修改 CSS 樣式和佈局。

translations.en: Add voice translation feature.
translations.zh: 添加語音翻譯功能。

translations.en: Convert a standalone useState boolean to a useState object.
translations.zh: 將獨立的 useState 布爾值轉換為一個 useState 對象。

translations.en: Move the function to a shared file.
translations.zh: 將函數移動到共享文件。

translations.en: I added (Promise.all and db_usestate) to check if the data has been loaded.
translations.zh: 我添加了（Promise.all 和 db_usestate）來檢查數據是否已加載。

translations.en: Long time no see, how have you been?
translations.zh: 好久不見，你過得怎麼樣？

translations.en: Because I've had a slight cold recently.
translations.zh: 因為我最近有點感冒。

translations.en: Yes, I was born in Taiwan.
translations.zh: 是的，我出生在台灣。

translations.en: You are my idol.
translations.zh: 你是我的偶像。

translations.en: I'm really a rookie, I never pretend to be otherwise.
translations.zh: 我真的是個新手，我從不假裝不是。

translations.en: Okay, let's practice English together!
translations.zh: 好喔，我們一起練習英文吧！

translations.en: Is it possible to work fully remotely at [Hsu Shen]'s company?
translations.zh: 在[徐深]的公司可以完全遠距工作嗎?

translations.en: I believe this may cause problems, I recommend synchronizing the names.
translations.zh: 我相信這可能會引起問題,我建議同步名稱。

translations.en: Trust me, you are better than me.
translations.zh: 相信我，你比我更好。

translations.en: I'm dead, you're so good at guessing.
translations.zh: 笑死，你猜得太準了。

translations.en: Education in Taiwan involves too much rote learning.
translations.zh: 台灣的教育涉及太多的死記硬背。

translations.en: Did your job interview go well last time?
translations.zh: 你上次的面試順利嗎？

translations.en: Last time, I remember you asked a question about unit testing in C#.
translations.zh: 上次，我記得你問了一個關於 C# 單元測試的問題。

translations.en: I can hear your voice
translations.zh: 我聽得到你的聲音

translations.en: Do you enjoy coding, or do you just see it as a job?
translations.zh: 您喜歡編碼，還是只是將其視為一份工作？

translations.en: If my English sounds weird, please let me know!
translations.zh: 如果有說的英文很奇怪請跟我說XD

translations.en: If someone says something impolite, you could say this~
translations.zh: 如果有人說了不禮貌的話，你可以這麼說~

translations.en: I have 8 years of software engineering experience. I currently mainly do [React Native] mobile front-end work.
translations.zh: 我有8年的軟體工程經驗，目前主要做[React Native]的行動前端工作。

translations.en: If you find anything that needs to be changed or is unclear, let me know and I will make the necessary revisions.
translations.zh: 嗯,你如果覺得哪裡需要改或不清楚跟我說,我會去改

translations.en: I'm okay with either. Whatever you think is more convenient.
translations.zh: 我都可以,看你覺得哪個比較方便

translations.en: That's a great approach. I'll consider it for future optimizations as well.
translations.zh: 很好的做法,我以後也參考優化一下

translations.en: I would like to confirm the requirements.
translations.zh: 我想確認一下這張單需求

translations.en: A birthday of a very cute girl.
translations.zh: 一個很可愛的女生的生日

translations.en: What functionalities does your backend need to have?
translations.zh: 你後端要做什麼功能?

translations.en: Didn't we agree to practice English together? QQ
translations.zh: 我們不是說好要一起練英文嗎？QQ

translations.en: So, after you finish writing the backend, would you still want to write more?
translations.zh: 所以你寫後端後還會想寫嗎？@@

translations.en: Hey, do you know who is responsible for the backend? I'd like to contact them to insert some data.
translations.zh: cy,想問你知道這個後端是誰負責嗎@@? 我去找他塞資料好了

translations.en: If the app isn't updated, please let me know.
translations.zh: 如果app沒更新,請跟我說

translations.en: Please let me know if there are any specific changes needed, and I will make the necessary adjustments.
translations.zh: Ok,如果有具體的改動再麻煩告知我,我配合修改

translations.en: Hi, could you insert game records into my account from the back end? I need them for testing.
translations.zh: hi,請問您這邊可以從後端塞遊戲紀錄進我的帳號嗎?我才能測試 謝謝

translations.en: Your microphone has no sound.
translations.zh: 你的麥克風沒有聲音

translations.en: Add feature to send notifications to all chatroom users.
translations.zh: 新增推播給所有聊天室使用者功能

translations.en: Add a 'lint:error' script to the package.json file.
translations.zh: 將“lint:error”腳本加入到 package.json 檔案中。

translations.en: Modify the TypeScript-style code in lotterHistoryData.js/slider.js to resolve issues when applied in JavaScript.
translations.zh: 修改lotterHistoryData.js/slider.js ts寫法用在js的問題。

translations.en: Add segmented loading functionality to the API.
translations.zh: 新增api分段加載功能。

translations.en: Remove field [NotificationOn] from the struct.
translations.zh: 移除結構中的NotificationOn欄位。

translations.en: Remove the loop calling BroadcastToUsers and change it to a single input.
translations.zh: 移除迴圈呼叫BroadcastToUsers改成一次性輸入。

translations.en: I’m at an age that is well-suited for being with you.
translations.zh: 我是很適合跟你在一起的年齡。

translations.en: Modify the shard's dependency injection and move it to the index file.
translations.zh: 修改shard的依賴注入移到index檔案。

translations.en: Is this feature designed to open the mobile browser directly, or do we need to set up a page for it?
translations.zh: 這個功能是為了直接開啟手機瀏覽器而設計的，還是需要我們為其設定一個頁面？

translations.en: Do we also need to have a return and a title?
translations.zh: 那一樣要有返回跟標題嗎？

translations.en: D is an ordered representation of a BSON document.
translations.zh: D是BSON文件的一種有序表示方式。

translations.en: This type should be used when the order of the elements matters.
translations.zh: 當元素的順序很重要時，應該使用這種類型。

translations.en: If the order of the elements does not matter, an M should be used instead.
translations.zh: 如果元素的順序不重要，則應使用M代替。

translations.en: A D should not be constructed with duplicate key names, as that can cause undefined server behavior.
translations.zh: D應該避免使用重複的鍵名，因為這可能會導致伺服器行為異常。

translations.en: Refactor GetUserChatrooms using MongoDB's aggregation pipeline for data composition.
translations.zh: 使用MongoDB的聚合管道重構GetUserChatrooms以進行資料組合。

translations.en: Sorry to bother you, but do you have multiple agent accounts on the SMH platform? I need them for testing.
translations.zh: 打擾下,請問smh平台你有很多代理的帳號嗎?我需要做測試。

translations.en: Hi L, do you have any SMH agent account in SIT/UAT that can borrow me to do a testing? Thank you.
translations.zh: 你好，L，你在SIT/UAT有SMH代理帳戶可以借我來做測試嗎？謝謝。

translations.en: Refactor user avatar logic and user authentication logic.
translations.zh: 重構使用者頭像邏輯與user檢查帳密邏輯。

translations.en: Improved clarity of dependency management across the application.
translations.zh: 提高整體應用程式依賴關係清晰度。

translations.en: Updated services and controllers to use the new DI setup.
translations.zh: 更新服務和控制器使用新的DI設定。

translations.en: It seems like I won’t be able to avoid getting involved.
translations.zh: 我應該是跑不掉要參與。

translations.en: What I know so far is that MC is working on infrastructure development and deciding which project to use as the foundation.
translations.zh: 到目前為止我所知道的是MC正在處理基礎設施開發，並選擇使用哪個專案作為基礎。

translations.en: He said he will give me an update next week to decide when to start the development.
translations.zh: 他說下週會給我消息決定何時開發。

translations.en: I heard this project is really rushed.
translations.zh: 聽說這個案子很趕。

translations.en: So I probably won't be too happy about it.
translations.zh: 所以我應該是不會開心XD。

translations.en: Especially since I have to handle both SMH and this one at the same time.
translations.zh: 畢竟要同時做smh跟這個。

translations.en: JavaScript, because in my nine-year career, every job has involved JavaScript in some capacity. I also use JavaScript for side projects after work or on weekends.
translations.zh: JavaScript，因為在我九年的職業生涯中，每項工作都以某種方式涉及JavaScript。我也會在下班後或週末使用JavaScript進行業餘專案。

translations.en: I researched mathematical algorithms and created custom RGB effects for these devices, offering features that are different from those available on the market.
translations.zh: 我研究了數學演算法並為這些設備創建了自訂RGB效果，提供了與市場上可用的功能不同的功能。

translations.en: It’s sad, but I’m not surprised.
translations.zh: 是很難過，但我不意外。

translations.en: I've called the API, but it's returning a 404 error.
translations.zh: 我有呼叫了api會404錯誤。

translations.en: Anna, the world needs you to step up and save it!
translations.zh: Anna需要你出來拯救世界了。

translations.en: May I ask which domain this API will be deployed to?
translations.zh: 請問這個api會部署到哪一個domain?

translations.en: Currently, we are using https://www.google.com/
translations.zh: 目前我們是使用https://www.google.com/

translations.en: Could you please let me know who I can contact to get access opened?
translations.zh: 您能否告訴我可以聯絡誰來開通存取權限？

translations.en: You can start developing this API while waiting for the opening.
translations.zh: 在等待開通的過程中，您可以先開始開發這個API。

translations.en: Can you add an entry for the countdown timer to the create button?
translations.zh: 可以在創建按鈕上添加倒計時器的條目嗎？

translations.en: Let’s also add a button to display the card details.
translations.zh: 讓我們也添加一個按鈕來顯示卡片詳情。

translations.en: You can move on to your next task after you finish this one.
translations.zh: 在完成這項工作後，您可以進入下一個任務。

translations.en: You can focus on other areas after clearing this issue.
translations.zh: 在解決此問題後，您可以專注於其他領域。

translations.en: In addition to fixing bugs, I can also work on optimizing the database performance.
translations.zh: 除了修復錯誤外，我還可以致力於優化資料庫性能。

translations.en: What kind of performance improvements can I expect?
translations.zh: 我可以期待什麼樣的性能改善？

translations.en: Is it possible to reduce the loading time of our API responses?
translations.zh: 是否有可能減少我們API響應的加載時間？

translations.en: I’ll review our database queries to see if any optimizations can be made.
translations.zh: 我會檢查我們的數據庫查詢，以查看是否可以進行優化。

translations.en: Our API will receive many requests simultaneously, and it needs to handle them efficiently.
translations.zh: 我們的API將會同時接收到許多請求，並且需要有效地處理它們。

translations.en: Can you suggest any tools for monitoring our API performance?
translations.zh: 您能建議任何工具來監控我們的API性能嗎？

translations.en: We can use tools like Postman or Swagger for testing our API.
translations.zh: 我們可以使用Postman或Swagger等工具來測試我們的API。

translations.en: Can you set up unit tests for our new features?
translations.zh: 您能為我們的新功能設置單元測試嗎？

translations.en: I will ensure that all new code is covered by tests before it gets deployed.
translations.zh: 我會確保所有新代碼在部署之前都有測試覆蓋。

translations.en: Let’s conduct a code review session before the next deployment.
translations.zh: 讓我們在下次部署之前進行一次代碼審查會議。

translations.en: Our team can provide feedback on your implementation to improve it further.
translations.zh: 我們團隊可以對您的實現提供反饋，以進一步改進。

translations.en: Let’s set up a schedule for our weekly meetings to discuss progress.
translations.zh: 讓我們設定每週會議的時間表以討論進展。

translations.en: I’ll send you the meeting invite as soon as we finalize the schedule.
translations.zh: 一旦我們確定了時間表，我會馬上發送會議邀請給您。

translations.en: It’s crucial that everyone stays updated on the project’s status.
translations.zh: 每個人都能保持專案狀態的更新是至關重要的。

translations.en: Make sure to document any changes made to the codebase.
translations.zh: 確保記錄對代碼庫所做的任何更改。

translations.en: We will establish a knowledge base for our project to assist future team members.
translations.zh: 我們將為專案建立一個知識庫，以幫助未來的團隊成員。

translations.en: It’s important to maintain a clean and organized code structure.
translations.zh: 保持乾淨有序的代碼結構是很重要的。

translations.en: Can you help me to understand the workflow better?
translations.zh: 您能幫我更好地理解工作流程嗎？

translations.en: Let’s ensure that all team members are on the same page regarding project goals.
translations.zh: 讓我們確保所有團隊成員對專案目標有相同的理解。

translations.en: I appreciate your help with this project, it means a lot to me.
translations.zh: 感謝您對這個項目的幫助，這對我來說意義重大。

translations.en: Are there any specific areas of concern that we need to address?
translations.zh: 我們是否需要解決任何特定的問題？

translations.en: Let’s create a list of action items from our meeting today.
translations.zh: 讓我們從今天的會議中創建一個行動項目清單。

translations.en: Please reach out if you have any questions or need assistance.
translations.zh: 如有任何問題或需要協助，請隨時聯繫我。

translations.en: Let’s make sure to celebrate our achievements, no matter how small.
translations.zh: 讓我們確保慶祝我們的成就，不管它們多麼微小。

translations.en: It’s been a pleasure working with you.
translations.zh: 與您合作很愉快。

translations.en: Let's chat later.
translations.zh: 我們稍後再聊吧。
